ags:resource.dc:title: Improving productivity - main taskof the regional economy
ags:resource.dc:subject: REPRODUCTION
СТОИМОСТЬ ТРУДА
COST OF LABOR
БЕДНОСТЬ
POVERTY
БЕЗРАБОТИЦА
UNEMPLOYMENT

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: With the gradual exit from the crisis of agriculture an important condition for main tain in gits sustainable economic development is to increase the efficiency of production on the basis of productivity growth. Labour productivity is a key factor in economic development. This indicator has been and remains an important indicator of the integral perfection of techniques, technology, organization of production and labor efficiency, competitive ness of the national economy and welfare.

ags:resource.dc:title: Sources of fixed assets reproduction of agricultural organizations in modern conditions
ags:resource.dc:subject: REPRODUCTION
FIXED ASSETS
LEASING
FINANCING SOURCES

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The articles considers the problems of using different sources of fixed assets reproduction, their positive and negative sides and also has given the estimation of efficiency different leasing forms.

ags:resource.dc:title: The justification of the sizes of the livestock farms on production of milk

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Tarabrina, E. (The northern electric networks - a branch «Moscow incorporated electronetwork company»)

ags:resource.dc:subject: FARMS
CONCENTRATION OF A LIVESTOCK OF COWS
EFFICIENCY OF ANIMALS
OPTIMUM SIZE OF THE FARM

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The farms are the only form of the managing in the dairy-meat cattle-breeding of the Tambov region in which there is a positive tendency of changing of the livestock for a number of years. The numerous layer of the strong farmers having from 50 to 60 heads of the milch herd isn't created in the region at the present time. In result there are the insufficient distribution of the consumer cooperation, the seasonal inflow products in the farms, the difficulties of interaction with the contractors. The optimum size of a farm on the number of a livestock of cows chosen by us is rather steady and perspective for development of small-scale production.

ags:resource.dc:title: Development of mechanisms of the state support of agrarian branch taking into account territorial distinctions

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Korneev, A. (All-Russian research Institute of organization of production labor and management in agriculture)
Captains, A. (All-Russian research Institute of organization of production labor and management in agriculture)
Osipova, A. (All-Russian research Institute of organization of production labor and management in agriculture)

ags:resource.dc:subject: ANTI-CYCLIC PAYMENTS
DIFFERENTIATION OF LEVEL OF SUPPORT
FUND OF DEVELOPMENT OF AGRARIAN AND INDUSTRIAL COM
STANDARD LEVEL OF THE BUDGETARY SUBSIDIZING
STATE PROGRAM
UNTIED SUPPORT

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In article need is proved and the actions directed on improvement and development of the mechanism operating within the State program of support of agriculture, providing effective use of means of federal and regional budgets and Reserve fund of Russia are offered.

ags:resource.dc:title: Optimization branch structure of production as strategic direction effective functioning in agrarian sector economics
ags:resource.dc:subject: BRANCH STRUCTURE
EFFICIENCY
OPTIMIZATION
ОПТИМИЗАЦИЯ
ЭФФЕКТИВНОСТЬ

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In this article was proposed functioning algorithm at agricultural enterprises based on the implementation economic and mathematical model optimization branch structure of production, which represents a problem of dynamic programming. Each step is connected with the realization of the annual production program, determined by solving the problem of optimizing industrial structure agricultural enterprise.

ags:resource.dc:title: Formation and development of the market of eggs and egg products
ags:resource.dc:subject: DEMAND
INTENSIFICATION
POULTRY MARKET
PRICE
SUPPLY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Describes the present state and tendencies of development of manufacture of eggs, channels in their implementation, analyzed the market of eggs and egg products and justified proposals for its development.

ags:resource.dc:title: To the question of the production of fruit functional teas
ags:resource.dc:subject: ANTIOXIDANT
FLAVONOIDS
FUNCTIONAL FOOD INGREDIENTS
TEA
VITAMINS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Article about the beneficial substances of tea, about the possibility of combining different varieties of tea and compositions of various kinds of tea drinks and teas used in preventive and curative purposes.

ags:resource.dc:title: Creating and functional drinks morse enriched phytoconcentrate extract of leaves and grass with antioxidant activity
ags:resource.dc:subject: ANTIOXIDANT ACTIVITY
BIOLOGICALLY ACTIVE SUBSTANCES
EXTRACT
FITOCONCENTRATE
FUNCTIONAL MORSES AND DRINKS
NIGHTSHADE SUNBERRY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The articles presents data of the development morses and drinks based on juice and syrup from Nightshade Sunberry with enrichment phyto concentrates of leaves of fruit plants and grasses. The content of soluble solids (S.S.), sugars and BAS Nightshade Sunberry is a perspective raw material in technological and economic terms. Development new types of morses from Nightshade Sunberry allow to expand assortment of functional morses and drinks.

ags:resource.dc:title: Developing the assortment of functional bakery and confectionery products
ags:resource.dc:subject: BAKERY AND CONFECTIONERY PRODUCTS
BIOLOGICALLY ACTIVE SUBSTANCES
TECHNOLOGY
ТЕХНОЛОГИЯ
ХЛЕБОБУЛОЧНЫЕ И МУЧНЫЕ КОНДИТЕРСКИЕ ИЗДЕЛИЯ

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article provides data on research of raw Jerusalem artichoke and developing the new assortment of functional bakery and confectionery products with adding additives produced from the artichoke. On the content of food substances developed new types of bread with added artichoke satisfy the needs of the body on the content of alant starch, cellulose, pectines, vitamin C, carotenoid and other bioactive substance are looking for functional food.

ags:resource.dc:title: Modelling of properties of the galvanic composit coverings used at restoration of details agricultural machines
ags:resource.dc:subject: COVERING STRUCTURE
GALVANIC COMPOSITE MATERIALS
MATHEMATICAL MODEL

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In work the model is developed, allowing to predict properties of the composite coverings formed by an elastic matrix and elastic micro spheres which form casually non-uniform two-level structure. Thus inclusions in a matrix are located not in regular intervals, and form congestions in the form of interpenetrating skeletons.

ags:resource.dc:title: Modeling of grain loss for combine harvesters

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Erokhin, G. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )
Sazonov, S. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )
Konovsky, V. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )

ags:resource.dc:subject: AGRICULTURAL ENTERPRISE
COMBINE HARVESTER
GRAIN LOSSES

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Obtained equations to model the losses of grain for grain harvester during the whole period of its use for agricultural enterprise and to choose the optimal speed of work of combine harvesters.

ags:resource.dc:title: Management of physicomechanical properties of galvanic composit coverings on the basis of chrome at restoration of details agricultural machines
ags:resource.dc:subject: BLANKET
GALVANIC COMPOSITE COVERINGS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Algorithms and design procedures of influence of the sizes and concentration of a strengthening phase of a composite galvanic covering for the purpose of reception of coverings with demanded physic mechanical properties are presented.

ags:resource.dc:title: Rationale form lagoon to obtain a homogeneous mass of liquid effluents

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Bulavin, S. (Belgorodskaya state agricultural academy named after V.Ya. Gorin)
Machkarin, A. (Belgorodskaya state agricultural academy named after V.Ya. Gorin)

ags:resource.dc:subject: HOMOGENEOUS MASS
HUMIDITY MANURE
LIQUID EFFLUENTS
LIQUID MANURE LAGOON

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Studies have shown that the moisture content is variable and depends on the time of mixing. With the decrease in humidity circulation fades out more quickly.

ags:resource.dc:title: Results of research of traction resistance of the rack of stump puller of stubs KP-2

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Egorov, D.A. (Open joint stock company «Michurinsk factory «Progress»)
Zavrazhnov, A.A. (Open joint stock company «Michurinsk factory «Progress»)

ags:resource.dc:subject: POWER CONSUMPTION
RACK
RESEARCH
STUBBING
STUMP PULLER
TRACTION RESISTANCE
WORKING BODY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Researches of working body of stump puller of stubs of fruit-trees KP-2 with justification of constructive and power indicators are presented in work.

ags:resource.dc:title: Modelling of restoration of details agricultural machines by method galvanic contact method of plating
ags:resource.dc:subject: ANALYSIS
BLANKET
GALVANIC COMPOSITE COVERINGS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Theoretical aspects of process of drawing of composite galvanic coverings on the basis of a chromic matrix on current-carrying surfaces are considered by method of galvanic contact plating (GCP). The analytical dependences connecting parameters of physic mechanical characteristics of a covering with technological modes of sedimentation of coverings and design features of the equipment, used in process are resulted.

ags:resource.dc:title: Research process for producing fuel briquettes from waste uprooting orchards
ags:resource.dc:subject: COMBINATION SQUARES METHOD
FUEL BRIQUETTES
SAWDUST AND WOOD CHIPS
THE CHARACTERISTICS OF RAW MATERIALS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: This article describes the methodology and results of the research process waste compactor uprooting fruit trees for fuel briquettes without using synthetic binders.

ags:resource.dc:title: Using compressed air for effective drying of agricultural machinery in preparation for storage

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Petrashev, A. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )
Sazonov, S. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )
Klepikov, V. (All-Russia research institute on use of technics and mineral oil )

ags:resource.dc:subject: COMPRESSED AIR
CONDENSATE
DRYING
HEATING

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The conditions for effective drying of agricultural machinery with compressed air are determined. The expediency of the associated heating air in the hose are shown.

ags:resource.dc:title: The influence of different soil cultivation practicies on the growth, development and yield capacity of corn for seed
ags:resource.dc:subject: SEED CAPACITY
SOIL CULTIVATION PRACTICIES
SOIL DENSITY
SOIL MOISTURE
WEEDING OF CROPS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article treats choise of the most effective soil cultivation practice while growing corn for seed in the Northern part of Central Black-Soil Zone.

ags:resource.dc:title: Different apio additives influence on biochemical indexes of rabbits’ blood

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Kashirina, L. (Ryazan State Agrotechnological University Named after P.A. Kostychev)
Golovashova, T. (Ryazan State Agrotechnological University Named after P.A. Kostychev)

ags:resource.dc:subject: APIO COMPOSITION
BEE-BREAD
BLOOD PROTEIN
PROPOLIS
RABBITS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article presents the results of experiments connected with bee-bread, propolis and their apio composition influence on rabbits blood protein.

ags:resource.dc:title: Technological quality of milk simmental cows and there holstein cross breed by season of year

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Ivanov, V.A. (Russian Academy of Agricultural Sciences)
Tadzhiyev, K.P. (Kazakh Research Institute for Animal Husbandry and Fodder Production)

ags:resource.dc:subject: BUTTER
CASEIN
CHEESE
FAT
MILK YIELD
PROTEIN

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Milk of Simmental cows complies with the requirements for making quality butter and hard cheeses. Concentrations of protein and casein decrease by 0.08%-0.10%, and rennet coagulation time is reduced by 1.3-1.5 times in the milk of crossbreed animals. By increase the share of Holstein blood more than 75% in butter decreases in concentrations of volatile and essential fatty acids, respectively, which degrade the quality of the finished product.

ags:resource.dc:title: Different vegetative tonus cows analysis of variation pulsograms with the help of scatterographic method in a case of “Vitartil” additive usage

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Nikitov, S. (Ryazan state agrotechnological university of a name of P. A. Kostychev)

ags:resource.dc:subject: FUNCTIONAL RESERVES
VARIABILITY OF A CARDIAC RHYTHM

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: They have the milk productivity increase in a case of adding dietary supplement “Vitartil” to cows of black-and-white breed having different original asexual tonus.

ags:resource.dc:title: Biologization agriculrure as the basis of resources saving

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Skorochkin, Y.P. (Tambov Research institute of agriculture)

ags:resource.dc:subject: GREEN MANURE
IMPROVED FALLOW
ORGANIC MANURE

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In the modern conditions there is a question of maintaining a positive balance of chernozem humus. One of the important ways to conserve and replenish is soil fertility restoration due to cultivating green manure crops and plants used for improved fallows.

ags:resource.dc:title: Responsiveness of soybean grades domestic and foreign selection on different term of sowing in conditions the northeastern part of the central black earth region
ags:resource.dc:subject: BREEDING PLANTS
GRADE
PICKING UP THE CROP
PRODUCTIVITY
RESPONSIVENESS
SOY
TERM OF SOWING
THE FRUIT OF SOYA BEANS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Studies were conducted to determine the productivity of soybean grades of domestic and foreign breeding at different times of sowing under the northeastern part of the Central Black Earth region. As a result of the work found that weather conditions in 2013 gave the best results sowing May 30 soybean varieties Sawyer 5-23.57 centner from hectare, but the worst appeared crop varieties Horol June 10-12.41 centner from hectare.

ags:resource.dc:title: The effects of growth regulators and method of raising annual aster on plant growth and development in field conditions

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Goncharova, S. (I.V. Michurin GNU VNIIS of RASS)

ags:resource.dc:subject: GROWTH REGULATORS
PLANT DEVELOPMENT
SEED PRODUCTIVITY
STRESSORS
TRANSPLANTS
TREATMENT

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The paper deals with the results of studies on the effect of growth regulators and methods annual aster raising in the field conditions. It has been established that sowing in the glass-house, transplanting in seed bed, treatment with + immunocytophyte and sowing in the glass-house, transplanting in seed bed and treatment with ecogel+ provide increase of annual aster seed productivity.

ags:resource.dc:title: The effect of ripeness on the keeping quality of tomatoes cv. Yahont
ags:resource.dc:subject: BIOCHEMICAL PARAMETERS
ENDOGENOUS ETHYLENE
KEEPING QUALITY
RIPENESS
TOMATOES

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Tomato fruits cv. Yahont were stored in green and lactic ripeness. The effect of ripenesson keeping quality of tomato fruits was found.

ags:resource.dc:title: Terms of passing phenophases of introduced dogwood cultivar development in Tambov region conditions

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhidyokhina, T. (Russian Research Institute of horticulture named in honor of I.V.Michurin)

ags:resource.dc:subject: DOGWOOD
ONSET OF BLOOMING
ONSET OF FRUIT MATURATION
ONSET OF VEGETATION
VEGETATION PERIOD

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The paper deals with the evaluation of terms of passing phenological phases of development in introduced dogwood cultivars during vegetation seasons in 2012 and 2013. Suitability of soil and climatic conditions of Tambov region was normal growth and development of dogwood plants war establishes. Total duration of the vegetation period in dogwood cultivars is 209 (Nikolka 1) and 213 days (Azovskii 1).

ags:resource.dc:title: The comparative assessment of the efficiency of different ways of growing pear and apple nursery transplants with interstem
ags:resource.dc:subject: APPLE (MALUS DOMESTICA)
DWARFING ROOTSTOCK
INTERSTEM (INTERSTOCK)
NURSERY TRANSPLANTS
PEAR (PYRUS COMMUNIS)
SPRING DOUBLE GRAFTING

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The results of comparative assessment of the efficiency of different ways of growing pear and apple interstem trees described in the article. Application technology with using the spring double-grafting allows increases the efficiency of the growing nursery transplants with interstem.

ags:resource.dc:title: Stability of clonal rootstocks of the apple to low temperatures
ags:resource.dc:subject: CLONAL ROOTSTOCKS OF APPLE
FROST RESISTANCE
SELECTION

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: From population of hybrids of clone root stocks of an apple of different years of hybridization genotypes are evolved, capable without significant damages to tolerate depressing of temperature to -37 °S annotinous incremental values and -16 °S an assemblage of rootlets.

ags:resource.dc:title: The problems and the perspectives of the development of the small forms of managing in livestock breeding
ags:resource.dc:subject: PROBLEMS IN PEASANT FARMS IN LIVESTOCK BREEDING
SMALL FORMS MANAGING IN LIVESTOCK BREEDING
THE WAYS OF FURTHER DEVELOPMENT OF SMALL FORMS OF

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The small forms of farming are starting to take leading place in agro-industrial complex. In this article we deal with main problems restraining the development of small forms of farming in livestock breeding and the main ways of efficient work in this direction.

ags:resource.dc:title: The role of credit cooperation in the development of the sphere of services on the village: historical experience and the present

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chernyshov, A. (Nizhniy Novgorod State Agricultural Academy)

ags:resource.dc:subject: HISTORICAL EXPERIENCE
PEASANT CREDIT COOPERATION
RURAL INTELLIGENTSIA
SPHERE OF SERVICES

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In the article the problem of use in the contemporary conditions of the historical experience of the participation of peasant credit cooperation in the development of the sociocultural sphere of the village is placed.

ags:resource.dc:title: Assessment of efficiency of business processes in regional poultry farming
ags:resource.dc:subject: POULTRY FARMING
QUALITY OF BUSINESS PROCESSES
КАЧЕСТВО БИЗНЕС-ПРОЦЕССОВ

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Methodical questions of an assessment of business processes in regional poultry farming are considered in the article. The author emphasizes need of an integrated approach to determination of efficiency of business processes in branch taking into account features of their organization.

ags:resource.dc:title: Prospects for the development of agricultural production regions of Russia (for example Ryazan, Lipetsk and Tambov regions)
ags:resource.dc:subject: ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT
EFFICIENCY
MODEN METHODS
STABLE DEVELOPMENT

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article describes the methodological issues of sustainable development of agricaltural production regions of Russia. The author emphasizes the need for an integrated approach to indentify the sustainable development of agricultural production, taking into account the characteristics of their organization.

ags:resource.dc:title: Use of a rice muchka as biologically active additive and studying of its influence on a dough rheology
ags:resource.dc:subject: ALVEOGRAPH
DOUGH RHEOLOGY
FARINOGRAPH
FLOUR GLUTEN
NATURAL BIOLOGICAL ACTIVE ADDITIVE
RICE MUCHKA

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Results of research of a chemical composition of a rice muchka and its use are given in article at knead dough as a biological additive. Influence of a rice muchka on a rheology of dough was studied and the optimum dosage of introduction of a rice muchka is defined at knead.

ags:resource.dc:title: The efficiency of the organization of storage and processing of foetus in their production
ags:resource.dc:subject: ECONOMIC EFFICIENCY
GARDENING
STORAGE AND PROCESSING OF FOETUS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with the modern state and tendencies of development of storage and processing of foetus in horticultural farms, their economic efficiency, the method of determining the efficiency of storage, basic directions of its improvement.

ags:resource.dc:title: Dynamics of the changes of the size of food fiber in the process of obtaining puree semi-finished product, puree and nectars for baby food
ags:resource.dc:subject: BABY FOOD
CARROT
FOOD FIBER

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is shown the results of our investigation of the degree of grinding carrot puree for baby food by the complex of equipment for wiping ""Tornado"" with a diameter of 1.5 mm and 0.5 mm and homogenization. The use of two-level wiping and homogenization carrot puree ensures size of grain 0.15 mcm to standard 0.20 mcm not depending on varieties of carrot.

ags:resource.dc:title: Methods and results of the valuation of carbon dioxide concentration during the decomposition of solomonavoznoy mixture
ags:resource.dc:subject: CARBON DIOXIDE
CONCENTRATION
DECOMPOSITION

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: This article presents the methods and results of studies of changes in the concentration of carbon dioxide in the decomposition process of solomonavoznoy mixture as well as the dynamics of change in temperature.

ags:resource.dc:title: Industrial application of the restoration of the details of agricultural cars by a composite galvanic covering
ags:resource.dc:subject: AGRICULTURAL CARS
BLANKET
GALVANIC COMPOSITE COVERINGS
RESTORATION

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In article questions of theoretical and practical application of restoration of details of agricultural techniques by method galvano-contact plating (GCP) are considered. Drawings and schemes of devices and the equipment, applied are resulted at realization of a method GCP. Comparative characteristics of similar methods of restoration of details are given. Being based on practical and a know-how, practical recommendations about restoration of various types of surfaces are resulted.

ags:resource.dc:title: Increase of physic mechanical characteristics of working surfaces of details of agricultural cars by composite galvanic coverings
ags:resource.dc:subject: BLANKET
GALVANIC COMPOSITE COVERINGS
PHYSIC MECHANICAL CHARACTERISTICS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The algorithm of calculation of effective modules of elasticity of composite galvanic coverings is stated. The settlement formulas connecting technological parameters of sedimentation with effective modules of elasticity of composite coverings are presented.

ags:resource.dc:title: Microhardness calculation composite chromic coverings at the restoration of agricultural machinery details and knots
ags:resource.dc:subject: BLANKET
GALVANIC COMPOSIT COVERINGS
MICROHARDNESS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The algorithm of calculation of microhardness of composite galvanic coverings on the basis of a chromic matrix is presented. It is received регрессионное the equation, allowing to predict microhardness of the coverings applied at restoration of details.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of biologicals on the feeding quality and some biological features of young pigs
ags:resource.dc:subject: BIOLOGICALS
MATURITY
NATURAL RESISTANCE
PIGS
RELATIVE GROWTH RATE

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is shown a result of studies of the influence of biologicals ""Sub-pro"" with laktofitom and ""Tsellobakterina"" with laktofitom on feeding quality.

ags:resource.dc:title: Monitoring of the biovariety of weeps in fruit and berry plantations of Central Black Zone

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Aliev, T.G.-G. (All-Russian Research Institute of Gardening named after I.V. Michurin)

ags:resource.dc:subject: BLACK CURRANT
GARDEN
HERBICIDES
LIQUOR
NURSERY
STRAWBERRY
WEEDS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with the biodiversity of weeds in fruit and berry plantations of Central Black Earth Zone. There is a list of weeds, soil and climatic conditions of Lipetsk, Tambov, Voronezh, Belgorod regions in it.

ags:resource.dc:title: Yield and product quality depending on methods for soil fertility increasing

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Skorochkin, Yu.P. (Tambov Research Institute of Agriculture)

ags:resource.dc:subject: GREEN MANURE
ORGANIC FERTILIZERS
PREDECESSOR
STRAW
YIELD CAPACITY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article presents methods of soil fertility improving and yield capacity. It is paid great attention to application of green fallow together with small doses of fertilizers and manure in conjunction with straw and root cereals residues in grain crop rotation.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of fertilizers and soil liming on agrochemical properties of leached chernozem and productivity of potato
ags:resource.dc:subject: DEFECATION
FERTILIZER
LEACHED CHERNOZEM
LIME
POTATO

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with the influence of mineral fertilizers, limestone dust, defecation on agrochemical properties of leached chernozem, the content of nutrient elements of soil, yield and quality of potatoes.

ags:resource.dc:title: Basin structure analysis of Tambov region
ags:resource.dc:subject: BASIN APPROACH
MODAL BASIN
NEGATIVE PROCESSES
THE STRUCTURE OF CATCHMENTS
WATERCOURSE ORDERS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article discusses the Tambov region from the standpoint of the basin approach; orders of watercourses and river basins were defined; attention is drawn to the need to incorporate the location of land use and tenure in the system of river basins.

ags:resource.dc:title: The influence of biologically active additives of plant origin on the growth and safekeeping of the broiler chickens of ""Ross 308"" crossbreed
ags:resource.dc:subject: BODY WEIGHT
BROILER
CHINESE MAGNOLIA
CROSSBREED
FODDER MIXTURE
SAFEKEEPING

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The result of research work has been determined that the increase of body weight and improvement of safekeeping of the broiler chickens can be achieved by including of Chinese Magnolia info the fodder mixture.

ags:resource.dc:title: Slaughter qualities young pigs and various biological
ags:resource.dc:subject: BIOLOGICALS
CARCASS WEIGHT
CARCASS YIELD
PIGS
SLAUGHTER WEIGHT

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: he article is shown a result of studies of the influence of biologicals ""Sub-pro"" with laktofitom and ""Tsellobakterina"" with laktofitom on carcass quality of pigs.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of forerunner and green fertilizer on the food mode soil and the productivity of spring wheat

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Borisova, E.E. (Nizhniy Novgorod State Engineering- economic Institute)

ags:resource.dc:subject: FOOD MODE
FORERUNNER
GREEN FERTILIZER
GREY WOOD SOIL
PRODUCTIVITY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with the influence of forerunner and siderites on the food mode soil and the productivity of spring wheat It is proved that the use of green fertilizer improves the balance of nutritious elements in soil. The employment meadow clover as the forerunner of spring wheat dresses soil under wheat during it earring with nitrates, phosphorus and potassium.

ags:resource.dc:title: Resource-saving technologies of agricultural crop production in Tambov region

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Skorochkin, Yu.P. (Tambov Research Institute of Agriculture)

ags:resource.dc:subject: GREEN MANURE
ORGANIC FERTILIZERS
PREDECESSOR
SOIL CULTIVATION
STRAW

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is shown the efficiency of green manure, straw and crop residues for resource-saving technologies of agricultural crops cultivation in the Central Black Earth Region. It is paid great attention to the types of soil cultivation and the calculation of artificial fertilizers doses using under the plants.

ags:resource.dc:title: Morphological peculiarities of generative organs of apricot in connection with varieties fertility
ags:resource.dc:subject: APRICOT
FERTILITY
GENERATIVE ORGANS
VARIETIES

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: It is shown that the communication between the numbers of stamens and the length of pistil in flowers of apricot varieties suitable for selffertility has the negative dependence. But the communication in selfsterility varieties is absent or very weak.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of the height of an inoculation and a type of a clonal stock on biometric indicators of the saplings of an apple-tree in the third field of nursery
ags:resource.dc:subject: APPLE-TREE
CLONAL STOCKS
HEIGHT OF INOCULATION
NURSERY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is shown results of the estimation of the techniques of the formation of the saplings in the third field of nursery of farm ""Komsomolets"". Its reflected influence of the height of an inoculation on an angle branches unions and also their length.

ags:resource.dc:title: The reaction of different root crops on the using of growth regulators

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Mukhortov, S.Ya. (Voronezh State Agrarian University named after Emperor Peter I)
Korolev, A.V. (Voronezh State Agrarian University named after Emperor Peter I)
Salimov, M.A. (Voronezh State Agrarian University named after Emperor Peter I)

ags:resource.dc:subject: BEET ROOT
CARROT
GROWTH REGULATORS
INDEX OF SHEET SURFACE
PARSNIP
PHOTOSYNTHETIC POTENTIAL OF CENOSIS
PRODUCTIVITY

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with influence growth regulators (albite, zircon and hydrogen peroxide and ect.) on the productivity of carrot, parsnip, beet root. It is shown indicators, characterizing photosynthetic potential of the cenosis of root crops.

ags:resource.dc:title: Influence of weather climatic factors on productivity of apricot varieties on the south of the Ukraine

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Dunaeva, L. (Melitopol Experimental Station Fruitticulture named after M.F. Sidorenko)
Klochko, N. (Institute of Fruitticulture National Academy of Agrarian Sciences)

ags:resource.dc:subject: APRICOT
PRODUCTIVITY
UKRAINE
WEATHER CLIMATIC FACTORS

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article is dealt with the influence of weather climatic factors on the productivity of apricot varieties (Olimp, Skarb and Shedevr) grown in the conditions of the south Ukraine. The microzones with the most favorable conditions for growing this culture are shown.
